title: Fair Value Gap Visualization
prompt: Create a trading chart illustrating Fair Value Gap (FVG) concept. Show 8-12 candlesticks with a strong impulse move creating a gap. Highlight the FVG: The gap between the high of candle 1 and low of candle 3 (where candle 2's body doesn't overlap). Mark the gap zone with a distinctive rectangle in orange (#F97316 at 30% opacity). Label: 'Fair Value Gap', 'Candle 1 High', 'Candle 3 Low', 'Imbalance Zone'. Show price potentially returning to fill the gap. Add 'FVG' badge on the zone. Include zoomed inset showing the three-candle pattern clearly. Dark background (#0F172A). Green/red candlesticks. Professional charting style with clean annotations.
negative_prompt: confusing annotations, overlapping zones, too many indicators, amateur style
